title: iOS or Android Developer
full_description: TEKsystems is seeking Mobile developers with Flutter experience, the initiatives include enhancing the end-user experience, increasing self-service capabilities, drive automation of business operations, and integrate with various IT systems.This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:Bachelorâ€™s degree in a technical field (e.g. computer science, information systems, math, engineering) or equivalent education/experience3+ years of experience designing, coding and releasing applications for a mobile platform3+ years of any experience with Objective-C, Swift, Java, Kotlin, or Dart3+ years of experience with writing unit tests and/or test-driven development- Experience building a complete app using the Flutter SDK, you will be asked to walk thru a simple app in the interview- Experience working with Microsoft SQL- Knowledge of how Spring Boot applications work- Understanding of continuous integration and continuous delivery- Experience or knowledge of Agile methodologies- Maintains working knowledge of programming languages in use at any given time- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and be capable of dealing with conflicting priorities with ease.- Self-starter with excellent analytical, communication and problem-solving skills- Experience with methodologies, policies, standards, processes, systems, and measurements that enable the enterprise to effectively manage software assets- Collaborate with design and engineering teams to drive digital development initiatives- Drive a culture of change, excellence, and innovation that constructively challenges the status quo and leads to prudent experimentation.
